channel.title: Game takes ages before starting up
channel.description: When I try to start the game it takes a few minutes doing apparently nothing until it decides to start up. There's, however, a proccess called BMS in the task manager with a disk usage of 99%. This doesn't happen to me in any other game.

item.title: Game takes ages before starting up
item.dc:creator: omegalucas
item.description:
Happens to me as well… at least after the last fixes delivered to the public beta.

Read full topic
item.source: Game takes ages before starting up

When I try to start the game it takes a few minutes doing apparently nothing until it decides to start up. There’s, however, a proccess called BMS in the task manager with a disk usage of 99%. This doesn’t happen to me in any other game.
